nodes.text: Dorumaa Base was a base on Dorumaa that was ran by the Thaereian military.

The base was located on the opposite side of Dorumaa to the resorts and cities and was in a remote place. The base contained a various buildings, including a hangar and three shield emitter towers. It was surrounded by a defensive ditch.

By the time of the Blockade of the Cularin system, the base was the Thaereian military's last ground base in the Cularin system. It was commanded by Major Vayla Sevren and the Confederacy of Independent Systems supplied battle droids to help defend it. It was attacked by the Cularin Militia during the Battle of Dorumaa and they destroyed the shield emitter towers and captured the base.
